resources.string: Feedback is an important management tool. \nI provide feedback to my staff
Does the 10 hour/day rule apply to management?
The Term Gig Economy refers to
a labour market characterized by the prevalence of short-term contracts or freelance work as opposed to permanent jobs
the market field of gadgets and gimmicks
freelance artists looking for the next audition
If I asked my staff about their goals for 2018
their goals are a subgoup of my goals
their goals are too vague for my liking
Please tell us which of the subjects \n the questions touched on was \nthe most interesting to you?
